decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">This permission shall expire after a period of two years from the date of this decision.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-4dd94859-7fff-c5aa-510b-d93fda243b13"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In order that the Local Planning Authority can review any change in circumstances after this period and to avoid the accumulation of unimplemented permissions.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The tree works hereby approved shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the description on this notice of approval by a suitable qualified tree surgeon and in accordance with BS3998:2010 ‘Recommendations for tree works’ (or any standard that reproduces or replaces this standard).&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of visual amenity and good arboricultural practice, having regard to Policy LP51 in the Local Plan 2033 (adopted 2020).</span></p>
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

description:
T1 - 82 DBH London Plane
Crown thin 20% (cut back to clear lamp column and building by 2m regrowth). 
Remove deadwood.
Lift 5m.
T2 - 70 DBH Lime
Crown thin 20% (cut back to clear lamp column and building by 2m regrowth). 
Remove deadwood.
Lift 5m.
T3 - 82 DBH London Plane
Crown thin 20% (cut back to clear lamp column and building by 2m regrowth). 
Remove deadwood.
Lift 5m
